text: The Pamantasan ng Lungsod ng Pasig (PLP) is a local university run by the Pasig City government in the Philippines. ==History== The school was conceived by former Mayor Vicente C. Eusebio, with the approval and subsequent implementation of the Local Government Code (R.A.7160). ==References== Category:Universities and colleges in Pasig Category:Local colleges and universities in Metro Manila
title: Pamantasan ng Lungsod ng Pasig
